item.title: Remote Mob Programming
item.description: Summary There are many resources to read about mob programming. There are less resources to read about remote mobbing. I will start by sharing my learnings. And then I will share my personal story from which my teachings have emerged. Finally I will reveal a slightly different flavor of mobbing which I am interested in. My Remote Mobbing Learnings Use a timer and schedule your mobbing sessions in the calendar.
